heroData.title:
Welcome
to the
Bolour Academy...
heroData.subTitle:
From mastering the art of
journalism to honing your
storytelling skills

aboutLeft.name: Behzad Bolour
aboutLeft.designation: Senior editors and producers based in UK

aboutRight.aboutText: Senior editors and producers of BBC Persian since 1990, and the producer and director of the program Bolour-e Banafsh. Behzad is a member of the old family of Bolurforushan in Tehran. His background his mother's side goes back to Abbas Mirza Qajar, and by his father to the importer of the Nickel silver and Crystal Factory of Iran, Mohammad-Hassan Bolurforushan.

achievement.text: Hello there! My name is Behzad Bolour. I am a Senior editors and producers, and Im very passionate and dedicated to my work.
With 10+ years experience as a professional producers, I have acquired the skills to make your project a success.

aboutRight.note: “Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Faucibus sed sit ultrices et sed metus sollicitudin.”

experienceData.text: I have been nominated for numerous awards for BBC World Service, as well as other programs. I have appeared in a series of animated films in the role of a stallion and I directed the BBC ZigZag illustrated story project.

experience.title: Teaching
experience.subtitle: In 2000, he traveled with a BBC team to Peshawar in northern Pakistan,

experience.title: Bolour-e Banafsh (Purple Crystal)
experience.subtitle: examines Iranian and Middle Eastern music, art, and culture

experience.title: Music
experience.subtitle: in 1980, learned the setar instrument from Jalal Zolfonun and then turned to playing the tanbur and komuz.
